H2.text: Who was the second wife of Henry VIII. Catherine of Aragon

H3.text: Who was the second wife of Henry VIII. Ann Boleyn

A4.text: Anne Boleyn (; c. 1501 or 1507 â€“ 19 May 1536) was Queen of England from 1533 to 1536, as the second wife of King Henry VIII.

A5.text: Catherine was formally stripped of her title as queen and Anne was consequently crowned queen consort on 1 June 1533 in a magnificent ceremony at Westminster Abbey with a banquet afterwards.
